summary: Created comprehensive frontend documentation in docs/FRONTEND_DOCUMENTATION.md covering all aspects of the Stock Verification System frontend including: technology stack, project structure, user roles, core features (13 major features), component library (60+ components), services & APIs (33 services), state management, navigation, offline capabilities, performance optimizations, security features, and development guidelines. The documentation provides complete reference for developers working on the frontend codebase.
current_status: Frontend documentation has been created and saved to docs/FRONTEND_DOCUMENTATION.md. The documentation includes comprehensive coverage of all frontend features, components, services, APIs, state management, navigation structure, offline capabilities, performance optimizations, security features, and development guidelines. Ready for use by development team.
